Name: Vatnik Simulator - A Russian Patriot Game
About the game: Russia, an alternative reality, in 2288, Russia finally became the greatest superpower country with bracing, vatnik news and vodka. Tsar Vladimir Putenoid already ruled 228 years, he raised the country from knees and continues to improve the lives of Russians. For example, he lowers the price of vodka. You play for a simple vatnik Ivan, and you need to live in Russia an alternative reality. Drink vodka, pray to the Putin and just enjoy life. Do you respect Tsar Vladimir? Features: -Game for real patriots -Vatniks, Tsar, vodka - everything is present in the game -Soundtrack - Russian Anthem and tracks from Nikita 'Ghost_RUS' -Simple and fun gameplay (just click on what you want to do) -Genre: Clicker-simulator -Various interesting pursuits (praying for the Tsar, going out the window, drinking vodka)
